import Wrapper from '../components/wraper' import '@hackclub/theme/fonts/reg.css' import { BaseStyles, Badge, Box, Button, Card, Checkbox, Container, Flex, Grid, Heading, Input, Label, Link, NavLink, Radio, Select, Slider, Text, Textarea } from 'theme-ui' import styles from '../styles/IDT.module.css' function HomePage() { return ( IDT Project Raleigh's IDT project about careers, written in next.js with theme-ui. (Press the circle for dark mode!) Career related to Programming: Database administrator.

A database administrator is a person who manages databases.
Duties:

  • Installing and upgrading the database server and application tool
  • Enrolling users and maintaining system security
  • Backing up and restoring databases
Main skills:
  • Patience
  • Meticulous attention to detail
  • A logical approach to work
Average Salary: $75k/year
Education required: Bachelor's degree

Career related to Cyber Security: Information Security Analyst.

Monitor their organization's networks for security breaches and investigate a violation when one occurs.
Duties:

  • Installing and upgrading the antivirus software on company devices
  • Conducting Autdits on the company's security
Main skills:
  • Analytical
  • Communication
  • Detail-Oriented
Average Salary: $100k/year
Education required: Bachelor's degree

Career related to Game Design: Game Artist.

Monitor their organization's networks for security breaches and investigate a violation when one occurs.
Duties:

  • Installing and upgrading the antivirus software on company devices
  • Conducting Autdits on the company's security
Main skills:
  • Analytical
  • Communication
  • Detail-Oriented
Average Salary: $100k/year
Education required: Bachelor's degree

) } export default HomePage
